item.title: Reading notes from statistical rethinking
item.description: I always have an anxiety to learn more about bayesian analysis but I have never put in any real action. Earlier today, I saw Davis Vaughan’s tweet on twitter asking basically the same question that has been bugging me for a long time. I saw many people are talking about the “statistical rethinking” book so I think, “umm, maybe I should give it a try”. https://twitter.com/dvaughan32/status/1027699962832986115 Luckily, I found this book in the little library we maintained at my workplace.
